titleStmt.title: Several captious queries concerning the English Reformation first proposed by Dean Manby (an Irish convert) in Latin, and afterwards by T.W. in English, briefly and fully answered by Dr. Clagett.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark for James Adamson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
